title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB:
Build F2 (20020602)Redhat 7.2, GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only).
Open the ImageAnalyzer example and notice that the scrollbars are enabled. You can move them around, but they don't have any effect. When opening a small image, like an icon, the scrollbars are misleading because they don't do anything.
EB: In the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars should be disabled, especially when opening a small image.
SR:
Build F2 (20020602)Redhat 7.2, GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only).
To reproduce:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled.
3. Open a small image, such as an icon.
4. Notice that the scrollbars are present but inactive, providing no scrolling functionality.
